trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> objects that represent the root keys in the Windows registry, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods to access key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref>代表根目錄機碼，在 Windows 登錄中的物件和<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>方法來存取索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the set of standard root keys found in the registry on machines running Windows.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供標準的根執行 Windows 的電腦上登錄中找到的索引鍵集。

trans-unit.source: The registry is a storage facility for information about applications, users, and default system settings.
trans-unit.target: 登錄是儲存區設備，如需有關應用程式、 使用者與預設系統設定資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, applications can use the registry for storing information that needs to be preserved after the application is closed, and access that same information when the application is reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式能夠使用登錄來儲存後關閉應用程式時，要保留所需的資訊，並重新載入應用程式時，存取相同的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For instance, you can store color preferences, screen locations, or the size of the window.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以儲存色彩偏好設定、 螢幕位置或將視窗大小。

trans-unit.source: You can control this data for each user by storing the information in a different location in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制這項資料的每位使用者將資訊儲存在登錄中的不同位置。

trans-unit.source: The base, or root <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> instances that are exposed by the `Registry` class delineate the basic storage mechanism for subkeys and values in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 基底或根<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>所公開的執行個體`Registry`類別描述子機碼和登錄中的值的基本儲存機制。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: All keys are read-only because the registry depends on their existence.
trans-unit.target: 因為登錄會視其存在，所有索引鍵都是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The keys exposed by `Registry` are: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser> Stores information about user preferences.
trans-unit.target: 所公開的索引鍵`Registry`是︰<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser>儲存使用者喜好設定的相關資訊。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine> Stores configuration information for the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine>儲存在本機電腦的組態資訊。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.ClassesRoot> Stores information about types (and classes) and their properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.ClassesRoot>儲存類型 （和類別） 的相關資訊和其屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.ClassesRoot>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.Users> Stores information about the default user configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.Users>儲存預設使用者設定的相關資訊。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.Users>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.PerformanceData> Stores performance information for software components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.PerformanceData>儲存軟體元件的效能資訊。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.PerformanceData>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentConfig> Stores non-user-specific hardware information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentConfig>儲存非使用者特定的硬體資訊。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentConfig>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.DynData> Stores dynamic data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.DynData>儲存動態資料。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.DynData>

trans-unit.source: Once you have identified the root key under which you want to store/retrieve information from the registry, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> class to add or remove subkeys, and manipulate the values for a given key.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已識別您想要儲存/擷取設定資訊所在的根目錄機碼，您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>類別來新增或移除子機碼，並操作指定的索引鍵的值。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: Hardware devices can place information in the registry automatically using the Plug and Play interface.
trans-unit.target: 硬體裝置可以在使用自動隨插即用介面的登錄資訊。

trans-unit.source: Software for installing device drivers can place information in the registry by writing to standard APIs.
trans-unit.target: 安裝裝置驅動程式軟體可以將資訊放在登錄中，撰寫標準 api。

trans-unit.source: Static Methods for Getting and Setting Values In the .NET Framework version 2.0, the Registry class also contains `static`<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetValue%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.SetValue%2A> methods for setting and retrieving values from registry keys.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定的值在.NET Framework 2.0 版的靜態方法，登錄類別也包含`static`<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetValue%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.SetValue%2A>方法來設定和擷取值，從登錄機碼。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.SetValue%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods open and close registry keys each time they are used, so they do not perform as well as analogous methods in the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> class, when you access a large number of values.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法都會開啟和關閉的登錄機碼每次使用，因此它們不會執行，以及中的類似方法<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>類別，當您存取大量的值。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> class also provides methods that allow you to set Windows access control security for registry keys, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>類別也提供方法，可讓您設定 Windows 登錄機碼，然後再擷取它，測試值的資料類型，並刪除索引鍵的存取控制安全性。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: Defines the types (or classes) of documents and the properties associated with those types.
trans-unit.target: 定義類型 （或類別） 的文件以及那些類型相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT。

trans-unit.source: Both conventional applications and OLE applications use data that is stored under this key.
trans-unit.target: 傳統的應用程式和 OLE 應用程式使用儲存在此機碼之下的資料。

trans-unit.source: This key also provides backward compatibility with the Windows 3.1 registration database by storing information for DDE and OLE support.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引鍵也會提供回溯相容性 Windows 3.1 註冊資料庫所儲存的 DDE 和 OLE 的支援資訊。

trans-unit.source: File viewers and user interface extensions store their OLE class identifiers in this key, and processing servers are registered in this key.
trans-unit.target: 檔案檢視器和使用者介面擴充儲存其 OLE 類別識別碼在此機碼，並處理伺服器都登錄在此機碼。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Contains configuration information pertaining to the hardware that is not specific to the user.
trans-unit.target: 包含不是使用者特有的硬體相關的組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG。

trans-unit.source: This member is mapped to a subkey within <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine>.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會對應到內<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine>子機碼

trans-unit.source: An example of using this member is an application that stores a different server name for its data depending on whether the system is attached to a network.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個成員的範例是儲存不同的伺服器名稱是否連接至網路的系統根據其資料的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the current user preferences.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前的使用者喜好設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_USER
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_CURRENT_USER

trans-unit.source: Information stored in this key includes the settings of environment variables and data about program groups, colors, printers, network connections, and application preferences.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在此機碼的資訊包括環境變數和程式群組、 色彩、 印表機、 網路連線及應用程式喜好設定的相關資料的設定。

trans-unit.source: This key makes it easier to establish the current user's settings.
trans-unit.target: 此金鑰可讓您更容易建立目前使用者的設定。

trans-unit.source: In this key, software vendors store the current user-specific preferences to be used within their applications.
trans-unit.target: 此機碼，在軟體廠商會儲存目前使用者專屬的喜好設定来在其應用程式內使用。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft, for example, creates the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft key for its applications to use, with each application creating its own subkey under the Microsoft key.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft，比方說，就會建立 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft 機碼來建立自己的子機碼，Microsoft 機碼下的每個應用程式搭配使用，其應用程式。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Contains dynamic registry data.
trans-unit.target: 包含動態登錄資料。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_DYN_DATA.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_DYN_DATA。

trans-unit.source: The Windows 98/Windows Me registry supports both static data (which is stored on disk in the registry) and dynamic data (which changes frequently, such as performance statistics).
trans-unit.target: Windows 98/Windows Me 登錄同時支援靜態的資料 （這儲存在登錄中的磁碟上） 和動態的資料 （這經常變更，例如效能統計資料）。

trans-unit.source: This dynamic data area is the mechanism that allows Virtual Device Drivers (VxDs) to provide real-time data to Win32 applications that can run remotely as well as locally.
trans-unit.target: 這個動態的資料區域是可以從遠端同時在本機執行的 Win32 應用程式可讓虛擬裝置驅動程式 (Vxd) 來提供即時資料的機制。

trans-unit.source: It also allows the system monitor to provide performance statistics on remote Windows 98/Windows Me systems.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓系統監視器 」 來提供 Windows 98/Windows Me 在遠端系統上的效能統計資料。

trans-unit.source: VxDs are not limited to performance data.
trans-unit.target: Vxd 不限於效能資料。

trans-unit.source: They can provide any data they want to pass from Ring 0 to Ring 3 efficiently without monopolizing the CPU.
trans-unit.target: 它們可以提供要傳遞從 Ring 0 環形 3 有效率而不獨佔 CPU 的任何資料。

trans-unit.source: The registry supports dynamic data by storing a pointer to a function that returns a value (or many values).
trans-unit.target: 登錄支援 「 動態資料儲存傳回值 （或許多值） 的函式的指標。

trans-unit.source: When a Registry call queries values associated with a dynamic key, that function is called to return the desired value or values.
trans-unit.target: 當查詢值的登錄呼叫動態索引鍵相關聯，呼叫函式會傳回所要的值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Dynamic keys were introduced in Microsoft Windows 95 to handle dynamic Registry data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 動態金鑰所導入在 Microsoft Windows 95 中處理動態登錄資料。

trans-unit.source: They are supported only in Windows 98/Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: 它們僅支援 Windows 98/Windows me。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support dynamic data; that is, it is not Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition, or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me).
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援動態資料。也就是說，它不是 Windows 98、 Windows 98 Second Edition、 或 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value associated with the specified name, in the specified registry key.
trans-unit.target: 擷取具有指定名稱，在指定的登錄機碼相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: If the name is not found in the specified key, returns a default value that you provide, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的索引鍵中找不到名稱，會傳回您提供的預設值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果指定的索引鍵不存在。

trans-unit.source: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵，以有效的登錄根目錄，例如"HKEY_CURRENT_USER"開頭的完整的登錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 名稱/值組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to return if `valueName` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回值`valueName`不存在。

trans-unit.source: if the subkey specified by keyName does not exist; otherwise, the value associated with valueName, or defaultValue if valueName is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的子機碼 keyName 不存在; 否則值相關聯 valueName ，或 defaultValue 如果 valueName 找不到。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有讀取登錄機碼所需的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> that contains the specified value has been marked for deletion.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"> </xref> ，其中包含指定值已標示為刪除。

trans-unit.source: keyName does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: keyName開頭不是有效的登錄根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Contains the configuration data for the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 包含本機電腦的組態資料。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE。

trans-unit.source: `LocalMachine` contains five keys: Hardware Describes the physical hardware in the computer, the way device drivers use that hardware, and mappings and related data that link kernel-mode drivers with user-mode code.
trans-unit.target: `LocalMachine`包含五個索引鍵︰ 硬體描述電腦中的實體硬體、 裝置驅動程式的方法使用該硬體，而對應和連結的使用者模式程式碼的核心模式驅動程式的相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: All data in this key is recreated each time the system is started.
trans-unit.target: 此機碼中的所有資料會重新都建立每次啟動系統時。

trans-unit.source: The Description subkey describes the actual computer hardware.
trans-unit.target: 在描述子機碼將說明實際電腦硬體。

trans-unit.source: The DeviceMap subkey contains miscellaneous data in formats specific to particular classes of drivers.
trans-unit.target: DeviceMap 子機碼包含其他資料格式特有的驅動程式特定的類別。

trans-unit.source: The ResourceMap subkey describes which device drivers claim which hardware resources.
trans-unit.target: ResourceMap 子機碼描述哪些裝置驅動程式會宣告硬體資源。

trans-unit.source: The Windows NT Diagnostics program (Winmsdp.exe) can report on its contents in an easy-to-read form.
trans-unit.target: Windows NT 診斷程式 (Winmsdp.exe) 可以報告在其內容以容易閱讀的格式。

trans-unit.source: SAM The directory services database of security information for user and group accounts, and for the domains in Windows 2000 Server (SAM is the Security Account Manager, known as the directory services database).
trans-unit.target: SAM 目錄服務資料庫的使用者和群組帳戶，以及在 Windows 2000 Server 網域的安全性資訊 （SAM 是安全性帳戶管理員，稱為 目錄服務資料庫）。

trans-unit.source: Security Contains the local security policy, such as specific user rights.
trans-unit.target: 安全性包含本機安全性原則，例如特定使用者權限。

trans-unit.source: This key is used only by the Windows 2000 security subsystem.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Windows 2000 安全性子系統會使用此金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Software The per-computer software database.
trans-unit.target: 軟體每一電腦軟體的資料庫。

trans-unit.source: This key contains data about software installed on the local computer, along with various items of miscellaneous configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 此機碼包含在本機電腦，以及其他組態資料的各種項目上安裝軟體的相關資料。

trans-unit.source: System Controls system startup, device driver loading, Windows 2000 services, and operating system behavior.
trans-unit.target: 系統控制系統啟動、 裝置驅動程式載入、 Windows 2000 服務和作業系統的行為。

trans-unit.source: By convention, if similar data exists under <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser> and under LocalMachine, the data in <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser> takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 依照慣例，如果在有類似的資料<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser>LocalMachine 中的資料在<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser>優先。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.CurrentUser>

trans-unit.source: However, values in this key can also extend (rather than replace) data in Registry.LocalMachine.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在此機碼的值可以也延伸 （而非取代） Registry.LocalMachine 中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Also, some items (such as device driver loading entries) are meaningless if they occur outside of Registry.LocalMachine.
trans-unit.target: 此外，某些項目 （例如裝置驅動程式載入的項目） 會發生 Registry.LocalMachine 之外，沒有任何意義。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Contains performance information for software components.
trans-unit.target: 包含軟體元件的效能的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA。

trans-unit.source: Each software component creates keys for its objects, counters when it is installed, and writes counter data while it is executing.
trans-unit.target: 每個軟體元件建立其物件、 計數器時已安裝並執行時，這會將計數器資料的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: You can access this data as you would access any other registry data, using the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> functions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取此資料，如同存取其他任何登錄資料，使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>函式。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: Although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以使用登錄來收集效能資料，資料不會儲存在登錄資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Instead, accessing the registry with this key causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，存取以這個金鑰登錄會使系統從適當的系統物件管理員收集的資料。

trans-unit.source: To obtain performance data from the local system, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A> method, with the Registry.PerformanceData key.
trans-unit.target: 若要從本機系統取得效能資料，請使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A>撘 Registry.PerformanceData 索引鍵。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first call opens the key (you do not need to explicitly open the key first).
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫開啟的金鑰 （您不需要先明確地開啟索引鍵）。

trans-unit.source: However, be sure to use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.Close%2A> method to close the handle to the key when you are finished obtaining performance data.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請務必使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.Close%2A>方法，關閉的索引鍵的控制代碼，當您完成取得效能資料。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user cannot install or remove a software component while its performance data is in use.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法安裝或移除軟體元件，其效能資料使用中時。

trans-unit.source: To obtain performance data from a remote system, you must use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%2A> method, with the computer name of the remote system and the Registry.PerformanceData key.
trans-unit.target: 若要從遠端系統取得效能資料，您必須使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%2A>方法，並包含在遠端系統且 Registry.PerformanceData 金鑰的電腦名稱。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: This call retrieves a key representing the performance data for the remote system.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫會擷取索引鍵代表的遠端系統的效能資料。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the data, call <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A> using this key, rather than the Registry.PerformanceData key.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的資料，呼叫<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A>使用這個金鑰，而不是 Registry.PerformanceData 索引鍵。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003, a user must at least belong to the Performance Monitor Users group in order to access subkeys of this base key.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Windows Server 2003 上，使用者必須至少屬於 Performance Monitor Users 群組才能存取這個基底的索引鍵的子機碼。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified name/value pair on the specified registry key.
trans-unit.target: 指定的登錄機碼上設定指定的名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的索引鍵不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵，以有效的登錄根目錄，例如"HKEY_CURRENT_USER"開頭的完整的登錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 名稱/值組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的值。

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: keyName does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: keyName開頭不是有效的登錄根目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or- keyName is longer than the maximum length allowed (255 characters).
trans-unit.target: -或-keyName長度超過允許的最大的長度 （255 個字元）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> is read-only, and thus cannot be written to; for example, it is a root-level node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"> </xref>處於唯讀狀態，並因此不能寫入，比方說，它是根層級節點。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有建立或修改登錄機碼所需的權限。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name/value pair on the specified registry key, using the specified registry data type.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的登錄機碼，使用指定的登錄資料類型的名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的索引鍵不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵，以有效的登錄根目錄，例如"HKEY_CURRENT_USER"開頭的完整的登錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 名稱/值組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的值。

trans-unit.source: The registry data type to use when storing the data.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存資料時使用的登錄資料類型。

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: keyName does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: keyName開頭不是有效的登錄根目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or- keyName is longer than the maximum length allowed (255 characters).
trans-unit.target: -或-keyName長度超過允許的最大的長度 （255 個字元）。

trans-unit.source: -or- The type of value did not match the registry data type specified by valueKind, therefore the data could not be converted properly.
trans-unit.target: -的型別value不符合所指定的登錄資料型別valueKind，因此資料無法轉換正確。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> is read-only, and thus cannot be written to; for example, it is a root-level node, or the key has not been opened with write access.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"> </xref>處於唯讀狀態，並因此不能寫入，比方說，它是根層級節點，或不具有寫入權限開啟的機碼。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有建立或修改登錄機碼所需的權限。

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the default user configuration.
trans-unit.target: 包含預設使用者設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_USERS.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位會讀取的 Windows 登錄基底機 HKEY_USERS。

trans-unit.source: This key contains a branch for each user of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此機碼包含每個使用者的電腦的分支。

trans-unit.source: The default configuration is supplied for new users on the local computer and for the default current user if the user has not changed preferences.
trans-unit.target: 預設組態會提供預設目前使用者的新使用者在本機電腦上，如果使用者沒有變更喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Because Windows 98/ME also supports Registry.Users, applications can access the user-specific information the same way they do under Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Windows 98 / ME 也支援 Registry.Users、 應用程式可以存取其 Windows 2000 的相同方式的使用者特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: Each user's information is stored in a separate file, which can be stored locally or on a network server.
trans-unit.target: 每個使用者的資訊會儲存在個別的檔案，可以儲存在本機或網路伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: Windows 98/ME can copy this file to the user's current system so that settings can move from one computer to another with the user.
trans-unit.target: Windows 98 / ME 可以將這個檔案複製到使用者的目前系統，以便設定從一部電腦之間移動與使用者。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
